Listing 18.9: Example of deﬁning an ARIMA model.
Next, the model can be ﬁt on the training data. We will use the defaults and disable all
debugging information during the ﬁt by setting disp=False.
# fit the model
model_fit = model.fit(disp=False)
Listing 18.10: Example of ﬁtting an ARIMA model.
